name: Trainz 2019 DLC - NS SD60E - 6963 GoRail
detailed_description:
NS SD60E number 6963 in the special GORAIL paint scheme.

In March 2013, Norfolk Southern released NS SD60E 6963, which was painted in a special paint scheme for "GORAIL."

Experience the power of the NS SD60E - 6963 GoRail as you shunt the yard and make your freight run!

Features of the NS SD60E - 6963 GoRail include:

Brand new Custom Cab and in-cab Signals!
Fan Animation
Ditch Lights
Night Lighting
Surveyor Tip: To create your own custom session in Surveyor using your new locomotive. Locate the NS SD60E - 6963 GoRail by selecting the 'Train' Tab and searching for 'NS SD60E'.

short_description: Norfolk Southern SD60E in the special NS GORAIL livery. Features include Brand new Custom Cab and in-cab Signals, Fan Animation, Ditch Lights, and more!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.12
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
